title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Tacit Knowledge Utilization Strategies in Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational learning and knowledge management, with over 10 years of work experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners apply the four dimensions of tacit knowledge (embodied, emotional, intuitive, spiritual) to organizational case studies
Learners design a four-stage practical model for externalizing and sharing tacit knowledge
Learners develop leadership strategies that promote organizational members' tacit knowledge using neuroscience and psychology-based approaches

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
